original_text: And have ye not read this scripture; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner:
korean_text: 너희가 성경에 건축자들이 버린 돌이 모퉁이의 머릿돌이 되었나니

sentences.original_text: And have ye not read this scripture;
The stone which the builders rejected
is become the head of the corner:
